pars: The Waranga News is a volunteer community newspaper serving the Waranga region of northern Victoria.

history.title: History
pars: Way back in September 1978, an enthusiastic group of community-minded people who mourned the passing of the Rushworth Chronicle finally got their 'baby' on the road.
These days the Waranga News has a print run of 1100 each fortnight, including some 250 subscribers.

get_involved.title: Get Involved
pars: The Waranga News is always looking for new ideas and contributions from the community.
So if you have any ideas of your own that you would like to see featured in the pages of the Waranga News, just email us at wnews@iinet.net.au or call in at the office, 33 Moora Road.
